name: Affinity Publisher Document
summary: An AFPUB file is a page layout project created by Serif Affinity Publisher, which is a desktop publishing alternative to Adobe InDesign . It contains page layout information, which may include text, images, graphics, and other Affinity Publisher elements. Affinity Publisher users often save magazine, brochure, flyer, invitation, book, and webpage layouts as AFPUB files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
